Foto: Mercedes sa rútil dolu zjazdovkou, tínedžeri stihli vyskočiť
01 Nov 2019, 15:35 by Webnoviny
1.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Vodič išiel autom dolu lyžiarskou zjazdovkou, jeho spolujazdkyňa sa zranila. O nehode informovala polícia na svojom oficiálnom účte na sociálnej sieti Facebook.
Podľa dostupných informácií iba 18-ročný vodič zastavil na parkovisku pri hoteli v obci Vršatské Podhradie v Ilavskom okrese a z nezistených príčin sa s vozidlom pohol vpred, prešiel cez zráz a auto sa rozbehlo dole zjazdovkou.
Mladík aj jeho 17-ročná spolujazdkyňa stihli z idúceho auta vyskočiť. Tínedžerku hospitalizovali, príčiny nehody sú predmetom vyšetrovania.

Photo: Mercedes crashed down the slope, teenagers jumped
01 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Webnoviny
1.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Driver drove down a ski slope, his co-driver was injured. Police reported on the accident on their official Facebook social account.
According to available information, only 18-year-old driver stopped in the parking lot at the hotel in the village Vršatské Podhradie in the Ilava district and for undetected reasons he moved the vehicle forward, crossed the cliff and the car ran down the ski slope.
The young man and his 17-year-old co-driver managed to jump out of the car. The teenager was hospitalized, the causes of the accident are under investigation.
